sys_remote_update_set.description:
Scope:
Provide the functionality to rollback inserts and updates after transforming an Import Set.
Components:
1. Table: Rollback record (u_rollback_record) 2. Script Include: RollbackImportsUtil 3. UI Actions: Rollback Record, Rollback Records 4. UI Policy: [ROLL] Make fields readonly
Additions: added related list for rollback records on the Import Set form default view
How to use:
The way that the functionality works is that for each import set transform and for each import set row in that transform a rollback record is created that holds the initial values of the target record and the updated ones. The rollback record is then used to revert the target value to the previous values and also easily check for changes after transforms.
For this to work a snapshot of the target record is needed before the transform starts and another snapshot after the transform ends. This can be done by adding to the transform map two scripts: onBefore and onComplete.
The onBefore script runs before any operation is done, for each row and can be used to determine the target. To create the first snapshot just use the following line:
new RollbackImportsUtil().createRollbackRecord(source, target, action);
The onComplete script runs only once when the transform is complete. At this stage the import rows should have the target set and we can get the updated values. To do that use the following line:
new RollbackImportsUtil().updateRollbackRecordsAfterTranform(source);
For a simple transform map this is all that is required to create the rollback records. For more complex ones with dynamic targets, call the createRollbackRecord method when required.
In order to roll back the records you can use the UI Action from each individual rollback record or use the UI Action from the Transform History and rollback all records associated with that transformation.
sys_remote_update_set.name: RollbackImports_v01

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_4f46fdaa2f050110c4b1e36ef699b65c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.RollbackImportsUtil</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>RollbackImportsUtil</name><script><![CDATA[var RollbackImportsUtil = Class.create();
RollbackImportsUtil.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    /*
     * @author Paul Paduraru
     * @description rollbacks the selected record
     * @param {GlideRecord} rollbackGR: record that will be rollbacked
     * @returns {boolean} returns true if successful
     */

    rollbackRecord: function (rollbackGR) {

        if (!rollbackGR) {
            return false;
        }

        var targetGR = new GlideRecord(rollbackGR.getValue('u_target_table'));
        if (targetGR.get(rollbackGR.getValue('u_target_record'))) {
            targetGR.autoSysFields(false);
            var operation = rollbackGR.getValue('u_operation');
            if (operation == 'ignored') {
                rollbackGR.u_state = 'ignored';
            }
            if (operation == 'inserted') {
                targetGR.deleteRecord();
                rollbackGR.u_state = 'rollbacked';
            }
            if (operation == 'updated') {
                var evaluator = new GlideScopedEvaluator();
                var updatedValuesJSON = evaluator.evaluateScript(rollbackGR, 'u_initial_values', null);
                for (var field in updatedValuesJSON) {
                    targetGR[field] = updatedValuesJSON[field].value;
                }
                targetGR.update();
                rollbackGR.u_state = 'rollbacked';
            }

            rollbackGR.update();
            return true;
        } else {
            return false;
        }

    },

    /*
     * @author Paul Paduraru
     * @description rollbacks all records associated with the specified sys_import_set_run
     * @param {GlideRecord} importSetRun: sys_import_set_run record
     * @returns {object} number of records and count of successful rollbacks
     */

    rollbackRecords: function (importSetRun) {

        if (!importSetRun) return null;
        var successfulRollbackCount = 0;
        var rollBackRecord = new GlideRecord('u_rollback_record');
        rollBackRecord.addQuery('u_import_set_run', importSetRun.getUniqueValue());
        rollBackRecord.query();
        while (rollBackRecord.next()) {
            var rollbackStatus = this.rollbackRecord(rollBackRecord);
            if (rollbackStatus) {
                successfulRollbackCount++;
            }
        }

        return {
            total: rollBackRecord.getRowCount(),
            successful: successfulRollbackCount
        };
    },


    /*
     * @author Paul Paduraru
     * @description retrieve the currently running transform for the specified import set
     * @param {string} importSet: sys_id of the sys_import_set record
     * @returns {string} sys_id of the Transform History (sys_import_set_run) record
     */

    getTransformHistory: function (importSet) {

        if (!importSet) return false;

        var importSetRun = new GlideRecord('sys_import_set_run');
        importSetRun.addQuery('set', importSet);
        importSetRun.addQuery('state', 'running');
        importSetRun.query();
        if (importSetRun.next()) {
            return importSetRun.getUniqueValue();
        } else {
            return false;
        }
    },

    /*
     * @author Paul Paduraru
     * @description creates an inital snapshot of the target record, to be used in onBefore transform scripts
     * @param {GlideRecord} source: object from transform script
     * @param {GlideRecord} target: object from transform script
     * @param {string} action: value from transform script
     * @returns {undefined}
     */

    createRollbackRecord: function (source, target, action) {

        if (!source)
            return null;
        if (!target)
            return null;
        if (!action)
            return false;

        var targetJSON = this.glideRecordToJSON(target);
        var initalValues = "(function(){\n\treturn" + JSON.stringify(targetJSON, null, 3) + ";})();";
        var rollbackGR = new GlideRecord('u_rollback_record');
        rollbackGR.initialize();
        rollbackGR.u_initial_values = initalValues;
        rollbackGR.u_import_set_run = this.getTransformHistory(source.getValue('sys_import_set'));
        rollbackGR.u_source_table = source.getTableName();
        rollbackGR.u_target_table = target.getTableName();
        rollbackGR.u_import_set_row = source.getUniqueValue();
        rollbackGR.u_import_set = source.getValue('sys_import_set');
        rollbackGR.insert();

    },

    /*
     * @author Paul Paduraru
     * @description updates initial snapshot of the target record after transform is complete, to be used in onComplete transform scripts
     * @param {GlideRecord} source: object from transform script
     * @returns {undefined}
     */

    updateRollbackRecordsAfterTranform: function (source) {

        if (!source)
            return null;

        var importSet = source.getValue('sys_import_set');
        var rows = new GlideRecord(source.getTableName());
        rows.addQuery('sys_import_set', importSet);
        rows.query();
        while (rows.next()) {
            if (!rows.sys_target_sys_id.nil()) {
                var targetGR = new GlideRecord(rows.getValue('sys_target_table'));
                targetGR.get(rows.getValue('sys_target_sys_id'));
                var targetJSON = this.glideRecordToJSON(targetGR);
                var rollBackRecord = new GlideRecord('u_rollback_record');
                rollBackRecord.addQuery('u_import_set_run', source.getValue('import_set_run'));
                rollBackRecord.addQuery('u_import_set_row', rows.getUniqueValue());
                rollBackRecord.query();
                if (rollBackRecord.next()) {
                    var updatedValues = "(function(){\n\treturn" + JSON.stringify(targetJSON, null, 3) + ";})();";
                    rollBackRecord.u_state = 'created';
                    rollBackRecord.u_operation = rows.getValue('sys_import_state');
                    rollBackRecord.u_target_record = rows.getValue('sys_target_sys_id');
                    rollBackRecord.u_import_set_run = rows.getValue('import_set_run');
                    rollBackRecord.u_updated_values = updatedValues;
                    rollBackRecord.update();
                }
            }
        }
    },

    /*
     * @author Paul Paduraru
     * @description get all fields from GlideRecord and adds them to JSON object
     * @param {GlideRecord} glideRecord: record that will be transformed
     * @returns {object} JSON object containing all the fields with their value and display value
     */

    glideRecordToJSON: function (glideRecord) {

        if (!glideRecord) {
            return null;
        }

        var output = {};
        var fields = glideRecord.getFields();
        for (var i = 0; i < fields.size(); i++) {
            var glideElement = fields.get(i);
            if (glideElement.hasValue()) {
                output[glideElement.getName()] = {
                    value: glideElement.getValue(),
                    displayValue: glideElement.getDisplayValue()
                };
            }
        }
        return output;
    },

    /*
     * @author Paul Paduraru
     * @description check if Transform History has records for rollback
     * @param {GlideRecord} importSetRun: record for which the check is done
     * @returns {boolean} true if it has records, false otherwise
     */

    hasRecordsForRollback: function (importSetRun) {

        if (!importSetRun) return false;

        var rollbackRecordsCount = new global.GlideQuery('u_rollback_record')
            .where('u_import_set_run', importSetRun.getUniqueValue())
            .where('u_state', '!=', 'ignored')
            .where('u_state', '!=', 'rollbacked')
            .where('u_operation', '!=', 'ignored')
            .count();

        return rollbackRecordsCount ? true : false;
    },
    type: 'RollbackImportsUtil'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-01-17 16:32:07</sys_created_on><sys_id>4f46fdaa2f050110c4b1e36ef699b65c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>31</sys_mod_count><sys_name>RollbackImportsUtil</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_4f46fdaa2f050110c4b1e36ef699b65c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-03-22 16:27:06</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
